pages.title: The Soul Inquirer
pages.text: The Soul Inquirer is a machine meant for detecting the presence of summoned creatures. How does it work, you ask? Simply give it a $(l:summoning/soulbook)Soulbook$(), and it will give a redstone output to comparators based on whether it detects a creature of that type.

pages.title: Upgrades
pages.text: Each range upgrade will increase the detection range by around two blocks.$(p)Each quantity upgrade functions as a multiplier for the number of creatures that can be detected.$(p)$(l:exploiting/ash)The next section of this guide will be on putting summoned creatures to use.$()
